modules.title: Introduction to MongoDB
modules.description: An introduction to MongoDB, its features, and why it is used as a NoSQL database.

modules.title: MongoDB Data Modeling
modules.description: Learn how to structure and model data in MongoDB using collections and documents.

modules.title: CRUD Operations - Create
modules.description: Explores how to create and insert data into MongoDB collections using insert operations.

modules.title: CRUD Operations - Read
modules.description: Covers querying data in MongoDB using find and related methods.

modules.title: CRUD Operations - Update
modules.description: Demonstrates how to update documents in MongoDB using update operations.

modules.title: CRUD Operations - Delete
modules.description: Explains how to delete documents and collections in MongoDB.

modules.title: Indexes in MongoDB
modules.description: Learn how to use indexes to optimize query performance in MongoDB.

modules.title: Aggregation Framework
modules.description: Introduces MongoDB's aggregation pipeline for advanced data processing and transformation.

modules.title: MongoDB with Node.js
modules.description: Covers integrating MongoDB with Node.js applications using the MongoDB driver.
points: Setting up MongoDB driver in Node.js

modules.title: MongoDB Best Practices
modules.description: Covers best practices for designing, scaling, and securing MongoDB databases.
